column1: BattleHint_npc_03_A_01;If you get confused during battle
column2: you’ll lose control of yourself and start lashing out at random. You might even attack your friends.

column1: BattleHint_npc_03_A_02;You can bring a confused fighter to his senses by hitting him
column2: but smelling salts get the job done in a much safer way.
I’ve got some I can give you.
